scripts.deploy: npx tsc && sam build --template-file "template.yaml" --manifest package.json && sam deploy --template-file "template.yaml" --stack-name "dev-prayer-request-app" --parameter-overrides "env=dev" --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --resolve-s3 --region "us-east-1" --capabilities "CAPABILITY_IAM" "CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM"
